ygData.subject: Re: Amulet of Order
ygData.msgSnippet: ... prices ... check up ... I m a wood elf.  Those were the prices at the armor seller in the wood elf city.  (AFTER I bought it, I realized that it was size
ygData.messageBody:
>Hmm, interesting. As a human with a charisma of 90 I can buy a steel
>breastplate in freeport for 700-something plat. I havent checked the
prices
>recently though, they may have changed it since for some reason. I'll
check up
>on this and see.
>May I ask where you purchased it and what race you are?

I'm a wood elf. Those were the prices at the armor seller in the wood elf
city. (AFTER I bought it, I realized that it was size Medium rather than
size Small, so I lost about 250 plat selling it back again. OUCH! I
finally found the size Small one in the Dwarf city.)

I've been fighting in Cazic lately. According to some posts on the EQVault
bug board, Cazic resets all your faction ratings to their default values.
If this is true, then it would account for some price differences.

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
